entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.6°C

Observed at: Jasper Warden Station 6:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

Humidity: 63 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 at times late this evening and overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Snow level 1800 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
